Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.anchor

Class AnchorManager

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.anchor.AnchorManager
@Service public final class AnchorManager extends Object
Manages anchors and it's location.

    • setAnchor

      public io.vavr.control.Try<Void> setAnchor(@NotNull @NotNull String anchorName, @NotNull @NotNull String location)
      Sets a new location for an anchor. Creates a new anchor if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      anchorName - The name of the anchor.
      location - The location of the anchor as string (world:x,y,z:pitch:yaw).
      Returns:
      True if the anchor was successfully saved.
